code: import{ALL_GENRES,AuthorizationStatus,LevelFilm,LevelFilmRange}from'./const';export var isCheckedAuth=function isCheckedAuth(authorizationStatus){return authorizationStatus===AuthorizationStatus.Unknown;};export var isCheckedLogin=function isCheckedLogin(authorizationStatus){return authorizationStatus===AuthorizationStatus.Auth;};export var getLevelFilm=function getLevelFilm(level){if(level>=LevelFilmRange.BAD.Max&&level<=LevelFilmRange.BAD.MAX){return LevelFilm.BAD;}if(level>LevelFilmRange.NORMAL.MIN&&level<=LevelFilmRange.NORMAL.MAX){return LevelFilm.NORMAL;}if(level>LevelFilmRange.GOOD.MIN&&level<=LevelFilmRange.GOOD.MAX){return LevelFilm.GOOD;}if(level>LevelFilmRange.VERY_GOOD.MIN&&level<=LevelFilmRange.VERY_GOOD.MAX){return LevelFilm.VERY_GOOD;}if(level>LevelFilmRange.AWESOME.MIN){return LevelFilm.AWESOME;}};export var convertMinutes=function convertMinutes(timeMinutes){var hours=Math.trunc(timeMinutes/60).toString();var minutes=(timeMinutes%60).toString();switch(hours){case'0':hours='';break;default:hours="".concat(hours,"h");break;}switch(minutes){case'0':minutes='';break;default:minutes="".concat(minutes,"m");break;}return"".concat(hours," ").concat(minutes);};export var formatDate=function formatDate(dateJson){var dateStr=new Date(dateJson);var formatter=new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-US',{month:'long',year:'numeric',day:'numeric'});return formatter.format(dateStr);};export var getListFiltered=function getListFiltered(list,genreName){if(genreName===ALL_GENRES){return list;}return list.filter(function(film){return film.genre===genreName;});};export var getFilmTime=function getFilmTime(seconds){if(seconds){return seconds>=3600?new Date(Math.trunc(seconds)*1000).toISOString().substring(11,19):new Date(Math.trunc(seconds)*1000).toISOString().substring(14,19);}return'00:00';};export var isValidPassword=function isValidPassword(pass){var re1=new RegExp('[0-9]').test(pass);var re2=new RegExp('[a-z]').test(pass);return re1&&re2;};
